summary: Create a website for a logistics and courier services business (ML Enterprise, Mokokchung).

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for the logistics and courier services business “ML Enterprise” located in Mokokchung, with all user-facing content in English.
Implement core site pages/sections and navigation: Home, Services, About, Coverage/Routes, Contact. Navigation must work via a header menu and a mobile-friendly menu.

Add a clear service presentation for ML Enterprise including at minimum: courier/delivery, logistics/transport, parcel handling, and business shipping solutions; include concise feature bullets and service cards.
Add a Contact section with a validated inquiry form (name, phone, email, message) and business contact details (address/location text for Mokokchung, phone, email, business hours).
Wire the Contact form to the backend using the existing actor/Internet Identity integration patterns in the template without modifying any immutable frontend paths.

Define and apply a coherent visual theme suitable for a logistics/courier brand (avoid blue/purple): typography, spacing, and a consistent color system across all sections (e.g., charcoal/white with orange accent).
Add a hero section on the Home page with a strong headline, short supporting copy, and prominent calls-to-action (e.g., “Request a Pickup”, “Contact Us”) that scroll/navigate to the Contact section.
Add static assets (generated images) to support branding and presentation, and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images from the backend).
Update the Coverage/Routes section to clearly state that ML Enterprise offers pickup facility anywhere in India (nationwide pickup), while keeping the existing Mokokchung primary coverage list.

Update the Services and/or Hero section copy to include a clear claim that ML Enterprise provides nationwide pickup across India (e.g., as a service feature bullet or supporting line near the primary CTAs).

Update the Contact section business details to show the provided ML Enterprise address, phone number, and email ID (replace the current placeholder contact info). Use the exact values:
- Address: "Tongdentsuyong Ward, A.M Road, Mokokchung, Nagaland 798601"
- Phone: "9366012115"
- Email: "mlenterprisemkg@gmail.com"
Update the site footer contact details to match the provided address, phone number, and email ID (replace the current placeholder values).

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a website for ML Enterprise (Mokokchung) showcasing logistics and courier services.
Persist submitted contact inquiries in the Motoko backend and expose a query method to list inquiries for later review.
Add/clarify that ML Enterprise offers pickup facility anywhere in India (nationwide pickup coverage) and reflect this in the Coverage/Routes and/or Services content.
Add a simple shipment tracking feature to the website.
Update the Contact section to display the provided business address, phone number, and email (Tongdentsuyong Ward, A.M Road, Mokokchung, Nagaland 798601; 9366012115; mlenterprisemkg@gmail.com).
